wisdom.sentence: A career is great, but you can't run your fingers through its hair.
A kiss is a course of procedure, cunningly devised, for the mutual stoppage of speech at a moment when words are superfluous.
A woman was in love with fourteen soldiers.  It was clearly platoonic.
Absence diminishes mediocre passions and increases great ones, as the wind blows out candles and fans fires.
wisdom.author: La Rochefoucauld

wisdom.sentence: Absence in love is like water upon fire; a little quickens, but much extinguishes it.
wisdom.author: Hannah More

wisdom.sentence: Absence is to love what wind is to fire.  It extinguishes the small, it enkindles the great.
All the passions make us commit faults; love makes us commit the most ridiculous ones.
wisdom.author: La Rochefoucauld

wisdom.sentence: Always there remain portions of our heart into which no one is able to enter, invite them as we may.
Bondage maybe, discipline never!
wisdom.author: T.K.

wisdom.sentence: Distrust all those who love you extremely upon a very slight acquaintance and without any visible reason.
wisdom.author: Lord Chesterfield

wisdom.sentence: Don't despair; your ideal lover is waiting for you around the corner.
Falling in love is a lot like dying.  You never get to do it enough to become good at it.
Give me chastity and continence, but not just now.
wisdom.author: St. Augustine

wisdom.sentence: God is love, but get it in writing.
wisdom.author: Gypsy Rose Lee

wisdom.sentence: "He did decide, though, that with more time and a great deal of mental effort, he could probably turn the activity into an acceptable perversion."
wisdom.author: Mick Farren, "When Gravity Fails"

wisdom.sentence: He who is in love with himself has at least this advantage -- he won't encounter many rivals.
wisdom.author: Georg Lichtenberg, "Aphorisms"

wisdom.sentence: Hearts will never be practical until they can be made unbreakable.
wisdom.author: The Wizard of Oz

wisdom.sentence: His heart was yours from the first moment that you met.
How much does she love you?  Less than you'll ever know.
I am two fools, I know, for loving, and for saying so.
wisdom.author: John Donne

wisdom.sentence: I can mend the break of day, heal a broken heart, and provide temporary relief to nymphomaniacs.
wisdom.author: Larry Lee

wisdom.sentence: I don't want people to love me. It makes for obligations.
wisdom.author: Jean Anouilh

wisdom.sentence: I love you more than anything in this world.  I don't expect that will last.
wisdom.author: Elvis Costello

wisdom.sentence: I love you, not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
wisdom.author: Roy Croft

wisdom.sentence: I loved her with a love thirsty and desperate. I felt that we two might commit some act so atrocious that the world, seeing us, would find it irresistible.
wisdom.author: Gene Wolfe, "The Shadow of the Torturer"

wisdom.sentence: I never loved another person the way I loved myself.
wisdom.author: Mae West

wisdom.sentence: I think a relationship is like a shark. It has to constantly move forward or it dies.  Well, what we have on our hands here is a dead shark.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: I used to be Snow White, but I drifted.
wisdom.author: Mae West

wisdom.sentence: "I'd love to go out with you, but I did my own thing and now I've got to undo it."
"I'd love to go out with you, but I have to floss my cat."
"I'd love to go out with you, but I have to stay home and see if I snore."
"I'd love to go out with you, but I never go out on days that end in `Y.'"
"I'd love to go out with you, but I want to spend more time with my blender."
"I'd love to go out with you, but I'm attending the opening of my garage door."
"I'd love to go out with you, but I'm converting my calendar watch from Julian to Gregorian."
"I'd love to go out with you, but I'm doing door-to-door collecting for static cling."
"I'd love to go out with you, but I'm having all my plants neutered."
"I'd love to go out with you, but I'm staying home to work on my cottage cheese sculpture."
"I'd love to go out with you, but I'm taking punk totem pole carving."
"I'd love to go out with you, but I've been scheduled for a karma transplant."
"I'd love to go out with you, but it's my parakeet's bowling night."
"I'd love to go out with you, but my favorite commercial is on TV."
"I'd love to go out with you, but the last time I went out, I never came back."
"I'd love to go out with you, but the man on television told me to say tuned."
"I'd love to go out with you, but there are important world issues that need worrying about."
I'd love to kiss you, but I just washed my hair.
wisdom.author: Bette Davis, "Cabin in the Cotton"

wisdom.sentence: If love is the answer, could you rephrase the question?
wisdom.author: Lily Tomlin

wisdom.sentence: If Love Were Oil, I'd Be About A Quart Low
wisdom.author: Book title by Lewis Grizzard

wisdom.sentence: If only you knew she loved you, you could face the uncertainty of whether you love her.
If you can't be good, be careful.  If you can't be careful, give me a call.
If you love someone, set them free. If they don't come back, then call them up when you're drunk.
In a great romance, each person basically plays a part that the other really likes.
wisdom.author: Elizabeth Ashley

wisdom.sentence: In love, she who gives her portrait promises the original.
wisdom.author: Bruton

wisdom.sentence: In real love you want the other person's good.In romantic love you want the other person.
wisdom.author: Margaret Anderson

wisdom.sentence: It is far better to be deceived than to be undeceived by those we love.
Let's just be friends and make no special effort to ever see each other again.
Let's not complicate our relationship by trying to communicate with each other.
Lonely is a man without love.
wisdom.author: Englebert Humperdinck

wisdom.sentence: Love -- the last of the serious diseases of childhood.
Love and scandal are the best sweeteners of tea.
Love at first sight is one of the greatest labor-saving devices the world has ever seen.
Love cannot be much younger than the lust for murder.
wisdom.author: Sigmund Freud

wisdom.sentence: Love conquers all things; let us too surrender to love.
wisdom.author: Publius Vergilius Maro (Virgil)

wisdom.sentence: Love is a grave mental disease.
wisdom.author: Plato

wisdom.sentence: Love is a snowmobile racing across the tundra, which suddenly flips over, pinning you underneath.  At night the ice weasels come.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, "Love is Hell"

wisdom.sentence: Love is always open arms.  With arms open you allow love to come and go as it wills, freely, for it will do so anyway.  If you close your arms about love you'll find you are left only holding yourself.
Love is being stupid together.
wisdom.author: Paul Valery

wisdom.sentence: Love is dope, not chicken soup. I mean, love is something to be passed around freely, not spooned down someone's throat for their own good by a Jewish mother who cooked it all by herself.
Love is in the offing.
wisdom.author: The Homicidal Maniac

wisdom.sentence: Love is like the measles; we all have to go through it.
wisdom.author: Jerome K. Jerome

wisdom.sentence: Love is never asking why?
Love is not enough, but it sure helps.
Love is sentimental measles.
Love is staying up all night with a sick child, or a healthy adult.
Love is the only game that is not called on account of darkness.
wisdom.author: M. Hirschfield

wisdom.sentence: Love is the process of my leading you gently back to yourself.
wisdom.author: Saint Exupery

wisdom.sentence: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
wisdom.author: H. L. Mencken

wisdom.sentence: Love IS what it's cracked up to be.
Love is what you've been through with somebody.
wisdom.author: James Thurber

wisdom.sentence: Love isn't only blind, it's also deaf, dumb, and stupid.
Love means having to say you're sorry every five minutes.
Love tells us many things that are not so.
wisdom.author: Krainian Proverb

wisdom.sentence: May your SO always know when you need a hug.
"Maybe we should think of this as one perfect week... where we found each other, and loved each other... and then let each other go before anyone had to seek professional help."
Most people don't need a great deal of love nearly so much as they need a steady supply.
My cup hath runneth'd over with love.
Nature abhors a virgin -- a frozen asset.
wisdom.author: Clare Booth Luce

wisdom.sentence: Of all forms of caution, caution in love is the most fatal.
Of course it's possible to love a human being if you don't know them too well.
wisdom.author: Charles Bukowski

wisdom.sentence: Oh, love is real enough, you will find it some day, but it has one arch-enemy -- and that is life.
wisdom.author: Jean Anouilh, "Ardele"

wisdom.sentence: One expresses well the love he does not feel.
wisdom.author: J.A. Karr

wisdom.sentence: People think love is an emotion.  Love is good sense.
wisdom.author: Ken Kesey

wisdom.sentence: Really??  What a coincidence, I'm shallow too!!
Sometime when you least expect it, Love will tap you on the shoulder... and ask you to move out of the way because it still isn't your turn.
wisdom.author: N.V. Plyter

wisdom.sentence: Sometimes love ain't nothing but a misunderstanding between two fools.
Sorry never means having your say to love.
Support wildlife -- vote for an orgy.
The giraffe you thought you offended last week is willing to be nuzzled today.
The heart has its reasons which reason knows nothing of.
wisdom.author: Blaise Pascal

wisdom.sentence: The heart is wiser than the intellect.
The little pieces of my life I give to you, with love, to make a quilt to keep away the cold.
The magic of our first love is our ignorance that it can ever end.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Disraeli

wisdom.sentence: The myth of romantic love holds that once you've fallen in love with the perfect partner, you're home free.  Unfortunately, falling out of love seems to be just as involuntary as falling into it.
The only difference in the game of love over the last few thousand years is that they've changed trumps from clubs to diamonds.
wisdom.author: The Indianapolis Star

wisdom.sentence: The onset and the waning of love make themselves felt in the uneasiness experienced at being alone together.
wisdom.author: Jean de la Bruyere

wisdom.sentence: The perfect lover is one who turns into a pizza at 4:00 A.M.
wisdom.author: Charles Pierce

wisdom.sentence: The person you rejected yesterday could make you happy, if you say yes.
The seven year itch comes from fooling around during the fourth, fifth, and sixth years.
The sweeter the apple, the blacker the core -- Scratch a lover and find a foe!
wisdom.author: Dorothy Parker, "Ballad of a Great Weariness"

wisdom.sentence: The way to love anything is to realize that it might be lost.

There are some micro-organisms that exhibit characteristics of both plants and animals.  When exposed to light they undergo photosynthesis; and when the lights go out, they turn into animals.  But then again, don't we all?
There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear.
There is only one way to be happy by means of the heart -- to have none.
wisdom.author: Paul Bourget

wisdom.sentence: There's so much to say but your eyes keep interrupting me.
Timing must be perfect now.  Two-timing must be better than perfect.
To be loved is very demoralizing.
wisdom.author: Katharine Hepburn

wisdom.sentence: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.
wisdom.author: Bertrand Russell

wisdom.sentence: Total strangers need love, too; and I'm stranger than most.
True happiness will be found only in true love.
Under deadline pressure for the next week.  If you want something, it can wait. Unless it's blind screaming paroxysmally hedonistic...
We don't believe in rheumatism and true love until after the first attack.
wisdom.author: Marie Ebner von Eschenbach

wisdom.sentence: What is irritating about love is that it is a crime that requires an accomplice.
wisdom.author: Charles Baudelaire

wisdom.sentence: When your life is a leaf that the seasons tear off and condemn They will bind you with love that is graceful and green as a stem.
wisdom.author: Leonard Cohen, "Sisters of Mercy"

wisdom.sentence: "Why must you tell me all your secrets when it's hard enough to love you knowing nothing?"
wisdom.author: Lloyd Cole and the Commotions

wisdom.sentence: Without love intelligence is dangerous; without intelligence love is not enough.
wisdom.author: Ashley Montagu

wisdom.sentence: Wouldn't this be a great world if being insecure and desperate were a turn-on?
wisdom.author: "Broadcast News"

wisdom.sentence: Yeah, there are more important things in life than money, but they won't go out with you if you don't have any.
You shouldn't have to pay for your love with your bones and your flesh.
wisdom.author: Pat Benatar, "Hell is for Children"
